title: Pushcat 1.0.4
description:
This is: Pushcat 1.0.4

I grabbed this thinking it was like a straight-up match-3 game (like Bejeweled and stuff), turns out it's got more of a puzzle kinda thing going for it... not my cup of coffee, buuuut I'm sure it has a lot to do with me sucking at Pushcat. CHECK IT (DRM-free, just install)!!!
--------------------------------------

Description:
Hey, who's that purple cat? 
Help Pushcat dig, push and mine his way through five worlds in his quest for sweet, sweet silver. Along the way heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll get chased by angry ghosts, explore caverns full of treacherous traps and even cultivate rockslime - gross! 
Pushcat is a retro-styled arcade game that combines classic 80's dig-and-push mechanics with elements of a Match-3 resulting in an original, fast-paced mix of puzzle and action gameplay. 

Pushcat features... 
-Delightful pixel art by Gary J. Lucken, aka Army of Trolls 
-Old school game design 
-Over 60 procedurally generated levels set in five themed worlds 
-A chirpy retro ragtime soundtrack 
-Colour-blind mode 
-Slime and rainbows. Every game needs slime and rainbows, right?


Minimum Requirements:
-Windows CPU Cores: Single Core
-Minimum RAM: 2 GB
-Graphics Card RAM: 128 MB
-Graphics Card Shader Model: Not Required
-Sound Card: None
-DirectX Version: 7.0
-Graphics Card: 7.0
-CPU Speed: 1.6 GHz
-Operating System: Windows XP (32/64-bit). Windows Vista (32/64-bit). Windows 7 (32/64-bit).


--------------------------------------
